rubric.description: Respond within 1 business day with empathy.
rubric.example_message: Thank you for letting us know. I’m really sorry this has caused frustration.

rubric.description: Ask for necessary details like order number, issue description.
rubric.example_message: Could you provide your order number and briefly describe what happened?

rubric.description: Check internal systems, logs, and consult teams if needed.
rubric.example_message: Document everything and cross-check customer claims with available data.

rubric.description: Communicate discoveries in a neutral tone.
rubric.example_message: After reviewing, it looks like the charge was applied correctly based on terms.

rubric.description: Propose a solution based on policy and investigation.
rubric.example_message: As a one-time courtesy, we’ve issued a $15 credit to your account.

rubric.description: Confirm customer satisfaction. Escalate if unresolved.
rubric.example_message: I’ve processed the credit. Please let me know if there’s anything else I can assist with.
